text: Vuga (yewe Muhamadi) uti “Yemwe abahawe igitabo! Nimuze (duhurize) ku ijambo riboneye hagati yacu namwe; ry’uko tutagomba kugira uwo tugaragira utari Allah, kandi ntitugire icyo tumubangikanya na cyo, ndetse bamwe muri twe ntibazagire abandi ibigirwamana basenga mu cyimbo cya Allah.” Ariko nibabitera umugongo, muvuge muti “Nimuhamye ko twe turi abicisha bugufi (Abayisilamu).”
